name: Hoppin' Hanz
description:
Hoppin' Hanz is an addictive hand doodled endless runner. Unlock a whole new world around you as you help Hanz hop from platform to platform.

-

PROCEDURAL LEVELS
Procedurally generated levels keep you on your toes and force you to react faster as you run.

SIMPLE GAMEPLAY
Quick to learn one hand controls, but difficult to master at high speeds.

PROGRESSIVE UNLOCKS
Push yourself to unlock the next hand doodled background object.
